page.title: 08ALL SOULS PRIORY.
page.content: { All Souls Priory}is a large building tucked away in{Old Headington.}It is occupied by some working nuns but is mainly a home for{elderly sisters.} Belonging to the order of{The Sacred} {Heart Of Jesus,}founded in{1813,}in {France,}the nuns are active and work in the community,{nursing}and {teaching.}They used to{teach only,}but due to many requests they became nurses as well. This caused the order to split, but the{two halves}continue to do both jobs. As they are working they wear{black}or{grey pinafores}and veils, very different from the{long} {black habits}worn in the{past.} The{Priory}belonged to a{closed}order until the nuns moved in, in{1969.}Many changes had to be made, as the house was so dull, in fact workmen refused to stay in the rooms alone as they said it was{"too spooky."}
